mapper.select: SELECT rp.ID_ AS id, rp.NAME_ AS name, rp.KEY_ AS defKey, rp.VERSION_ as LEVEL FROM act_ru_identitylink ri, act_re_procdef rp WHERE rp.ID_ = ri.PROC_DEF_ID_ and ri.GROUP_ID_ = #{groupId} and ri.TYPE_ = 'candidate'

select id,name,defKey,level from ( select rp1.ID_ AS id, rp1.NAME_ AS name, rp1.KEY_ AS defKey, rp1.VERSION_ as level from act_re_procdef as rp1 where rp1.KEY_ not in( SELECT rp.KEY_ FROM act_ru_identitylink ri, act_re_procdef rp WHERE rp.ID_ = ri.PROC_DEF_ID_ and ri.GROUP_ID_ = #{groupId} and ri.TYPE_ = 'candidate') order by rp1.VERSION_ desc )as a group by defkey

SELECT ard.KEY_ as defKey, ard.NAME_ as name, ard.VERSION_ as level FROM ( SELECT arp.KEY_, arp.NAME_, arp.VERSION_, arp.ID_ FROM act_re_procdef arp ORDER BY arp.VERSION_ DESC ) ard where ard.KEY_ = #{defKey} GROUP BY ard.key_
